title: Ep 58: The Nitty Gritty of Our Morning Routines
itunes:title: Ep 58: The Nitty Gritty of Our Morning Routines
description:
Today it's just us, and we're interviewing each other about the nitty gritty of our morning routines. From breakfast to beauty products, we're breaking down our morning rituals.

This episode was inspired by a series on A Few Things with Claire And Erica. It's one of our favorite podcasts, you should check it out!

Also in this episode, Grace met (and clung for dear life to) Peter Hermann from Younger and Becca has a mortifying Uber saga that ended in -1 pairs of shoes.

Sponsor: 

  • Harper Wilde: Go to Harperwilde.com/bop and use promo code BOP to get 15% off your first purchase.
  • Care/of: For 30% off your first Care/of order go to takecareof.com and enter code BOP at checkout.
  • Modern Fertility: Take the fertility quiz and get $20 off your first kit at ModernFertility.com/BOP

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast
